titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Great Britain, Foreign Office, Wellington House publications
Great Britain, Foreign Office, Wellington House publications
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Trevor Wood

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-07-21T11:45-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Great Britain, Foreign Office, Wellington House publications

physdesc.extent: 12 manuscript boxes, 5 cardfile boxes, 1 cubic foot box

did.abstract: Books, pamphlets, and miscellany, relating to World War I and British participation in it.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Great Britain. Foreign Office. Wellington House.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Great Britain, Foreign Office, Wellington House publications, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Propaganda section of the British Foreign Office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Books, pamphlets, and miscellany, relating to World War I and British participation in it. A card file index in box 18 describes this collection.

did.unittitle: "The Achievements of the Zeppelins." By a Swede. T. Fisher Unwin, London, Reprinted from the Stockholms Dagblad. 16pp.
